1: Praise Yah![a] Blessed is the man who fears Yahweh; he takes great delight in his commands.
2: His descendants[b] will be mighty in the land; the generation of the upright will be blessed.
3: Wealth and riches are in his house, and his righteousness endures forever.
4: His light rises in the darkness for the upright; he is gracious and compassionate and righteous.
5: It goes well for a man who is gracious and lends, who conducts his business properly.[c]
6: For he will not be shaken forever; the righteous will be remembered forever.[d]
7: He is not afraid of bad news; his heart is steadfast, secure[e] in Yahweh.
8: His heart is sustained; he will not be afraid, until he looks in triumph on his enemies.
9: He gives lavishly[f] to the needy; his righteousness endures forever. His horn rises high in honor.
10: The wicked[g] sees it and is vexed. He gnashes his teeth and becomes weak.[h] The desire of the wicked[i] perishes.
